offline.offline_msg: You're offline. Some features may be limited.

home.hero_sub: Your intelligent farming companion for weather, advisory, and community support
home.features_sub: Everything you need to make informed farming decisions in one place
home.feature_weather_desc: Real-time weather forecasts and alerts tailored to your farm location
home.feature_advisory_desc: AI-powered crop recommendations and pest management solutions
home.feature_community_desc: Connect with fellow farmers, share experiences, and learn together
home.feature_market_desc: Live crop market prices and trends to help you make informed decisions
home.cta_authenticated: Continue to your dashboard to access all features
home.cta_unauthenticated: Join thousands of farmers already using AgriSense

footer.about_text: Empowering farmers through smart insights and community support.

advisory.ndvi_desc: Vegetation index for current crop condition

motivational.subtitle: Keep nurturing your land with smart decisions

advisory.title: Advisory Details

advisory.no_recommendations: No specific recommendations at this time.

error.title: Unable to Load Advisory
error.no_crop: No crop specified. Please select a crop.

explainability.title: How we determined this:
explainability.description: This advisory is based on a combination of weather data, satellite imagery (NDVI), and market prices. The rule-based engine evaluated multiple conditions to generate these recommendations.
explainability.description_with_sources: This advisory is based on a combination of {{weather}} weather data, {{satellite}} satellite imagery (NDVI), and {{market}} market prices. The rule-based engine evaluated multiple conditions including temperature, humidity, soil moisture, NDVI changes, and market trends to generate these recommendations.
